00086         public function __construct($key = null, $secret_key = null)

00095         // AUTHENTICATION

00110         public function authenticate($bucket, $opt = null, $location = null, $redirects = 0)
00111         {
00112                 // If nothing was passed in, don't do anything.
00113                 if (!$opt)
00114                 {
00115                         return false;
00116                 }
00117                 else
00118                 {
00119                         // Set default values
00120                         $bucket = strtolower($bucket);
00121                         $acl = null;
00122                         $body = null;
00123                         $contentType = null;
00124                         $delimiter = null;
00125                         $filename = null;
00126                         $marker = null;
00127                         $maxKeys = null;
00128                         $method = null;
00129                         $prefix = null;
00130                         $verb = null;
00131                         $lastmodified = null;
00132                         $etag = null;
00133                         $qsa = null;
00134                         $md5 = null;
00135                         $meta = null;
00136                         $hmeta = null;
00137                         $range = null;
00138                         $returnCurlHandle = null;
00139 
00140                         // Break the array into individual variables, while storing the original.
00141                         $_opt = $opt;
00142                         extract($opt);
00143 
00144                         $filename = rawurlencode($filename);
00145 
00146                         // Set hostname
00147                         if ($this->vhost)
00148                         {
00149                                 $hostname = $this->vhost;
00150                         }
00151                         elseif ($method == 'list_buckets')
00152                         {
00153                                 $hostname = 's3.amazonaws.com';
00154                         }
00155                         else
00156                         {
00157                                 $hostname = $bucket . '.s3.amazonaws.com';
00158                         }
00159 
00160                         // Get the UTC timestamp in RFC 2616 format
00161                         $since_epoch = time() + $this->adjust_offset;
00162                         $httpDate = gmdate(DATE_AWS_RFC2616, $since_epoch);
00163 
00164                         // Generate the request string
00165                         $request = '';
00166 
00167                         // Append additional parameters
00168                         $request .= '/' . $filename;
00169 
00170                         // List Object settings
00171                         if ($method == 'list_objects')
00172                         {
00173                                 if (isset($prefix) && !empty($prefix))
00174                                 {
00175                                         $request = '/?prefix=' . $prefix;
00176                                 }
00177                                 else if (isset($marker) && !empty($marker))
00178                                 {
00179                                         $request = '/?marker=' . $marker;
00180                                 }
00181                                 else if (isset($maxKeys) && !empty($maxKeys))
00182                                 {
00183                                         $request = '/?max-keys=' . $maxKeys;
00184                                 }
00185                                 else if (isset($delimiter) && !empty($delimiter))
00186                                 {
00187                                         $request = '/?delimiter=' . $delimiter;
00188                                 }
00189                         }
00190 
00191                         // Logging
00192                         elseif ($method == 'get_logs')
00193                         {
00194                                 $request .= '?logging';
00195                                 $filename .= '?logging';
00196                         }
00197 
00198                         // Get Bucket Locale settings
00199                         elseif ($method == 'get_bucket_locale')
00200                         {
00201                                 $request = '/?location';
00202                                 $filename = '?location';
00203                         }
00204 
00205                         // Add ACL stuff if we're getting/setting ACL preferences.
00206                         elseif ($method == 'get_bucket_acl' || $method == 'get_object_acl')
00207                         {
00208                                 $request .= '?acl';
00209                                 $filename .= '?acl';
00210                         }
00211 
00212                         if (!$request == '/')
00213                         {
00214                                 $request = '/' . $request;
00215                         }
00216 
00217                         // Prepare the request.
00218                         if ($location)
00219                         {
00220                                 $this->request_url = $location;
00221                         }
00222                         else
00223                         {
00224                                 $this->request_url = 'http://' . $hostname . $request;
00225                         }
00226 
00227                         // Instantiate the request class
00228                         $req = new $this->request_class($this->request_url);
00229 
00230                         // Do we have a verb?
00231                         if (isset($verb) && !empty($verb))
00232                         {
00233                                 $req->setMethod($verb);
00234                         }
00235 
00236                         // Do we have a contentType?
00237                         if (isset($contentType) && !empty($contentType))
00238                         {
00239                                 $req->addHeader('Content-Type', $contentType);
00240                         }
00241                         else if ($verb == HTTP_PUT) // Set a default value for HTTP_PUT
00242                         {
00243                                 $contentType = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded';
00244                         }
00245 
00246                         // Do we have a date?
00247                         if (isset($httpDate) && !empty($httpDate))
00248                         {
00249                                 $req->addHeader("Date", $httpDate);
00250                         }
00251 
00252                         // Do we have ACL settings? (Optional in signed string)
00253                         if (isset($acl) && !empty($acl))
00254                         {
00255                                 $req->addHeader("x-amz-acl", $acl);
00256                                 $acl = 'x-amz-acl:' . $acl . "\n";
00257                         }
00258 
00259                         // Do we have COPY settings?
00260                         if ($method == 'copy_object')
00261                         {
00262                                 $acl .= 'x-amz-copy-source:/' . $sourceBucket . '/' . $sourceObject . "\n";
00263                                 $req->addHeader('x-amz-copy-source', '/' . $sourceBucket . '/' . $sourceObject);
00264                         }
00265 
00266                         // Are we checking for changes?
00267                         if ($lastmodified && $etag)
00268                         {
00269                                 $req->addHeader('If-Modified-Since', $lastmodified);
00270                                 $req->addHeader('If-None-Match', $etag);
00271                         }
00272 
00273                         // Partial content range
00274                         if ($range)
00275                         {
00276                                 $req->addHeader('Range', 'bytes=' . $range);
00277                         }
00278 
00279                         // Add a body if we're creating
00280                         if ($method == 'create_object' || $method == 'create_bucket')
00281                         {
00282                                 if (isset($body) && !empty($body))
00283                                 {
00284                                         $req->setBody($body);
00285                                         $md5 = $this->util->hex_to_base64(md5($body));
00286                                         $req->addHeader('Content-MD5', $md5);
00287                                 }
00288 
00289                                 // Add any meta headers.
00290                                 if ($meta)
00291                                 {
00292                                         uksort($meta, 'strnatcasecmp');
00293 
00294                                         foreach ($meta as $k => $v)
00295                                         {
00296                                                 $req->addHeader('x-amz-meta-' . strtolower($k), $v);
00297                                                 $hmeta .= 'x-amz-meta-' . strtolower($k) . ':' . $v . "\n";
00298                                         }
00299                                 }
00300                         }
00301 
00302                         // Data that will be "signed".
00303                         $filename = '/' . $filename;
00304 
00305                         // If we're listing buckets, there is no filename value.
00306                         if ($method == 'list_buckets')
00307                         {
00308                                 $filename = '';
00309                         }
00310 
00311                         if ($qsa)
00312                         {
00313                                 // Prepare the string to sign
00314                                 $stringToSign = "$verb\n$md5\n$contentType\n$since_epoch\n$acl$hmeta/$bucket$filename";
00315                         }
00316                         else
00317                         {
00318                                 // Prepare the string to sign
00319                                 $stringToSign = "$verb\n$md5\n$contentType\n$httpDate\n$acl$hmeta/$bucket$filename";
00320                         }
00321 
00322                         // Hash the AWS secret key and generate a signature for the request.
00323                         $signature = $this->util->hex_to_base64(hash_hmac('sha1', $stringToSign, $this->secret_key));
00324 
00325                         // Pass the developer key and signature
00326                         $req->addHeader("Authorization", "AWS " . $this->key . ":" . $signature);
00327 
00328                         // If we have a "true" value for returnCurlHandle, do that instead of completing the request.
00329                         if ($returnCurlHandle)
00330                         {
00331                                 return $req->prepRequest();
00332                         }
00333 
00334                         // Are we getting a Query String Auth?
00335                         if ($qsa)
00336                         {
00337                                 return array(
00338                                         'bucket' => $bucket,
00339                                         'filename' => $filename,
00340                                         'key' => $this->key,
00341                                         'expires' => $since_epoch,
00342                                         'signature' => $signature,
00343                                 );
00344                         }
00345 
00346                         // Send!
00347                         $req->sendRequest();
00348 
00349                         // Prepare the response.
00350                         $headers = $req->getResponseHeader();
00351                         $headers['x-tarzan-redirects'] = $redirects;
00352                         $headers['x-tarzan-requesturl'] = $this->request_url;
00353                         $headers['x-tarzan-stringtosign'] = $stringToSign;
00354                         $headers['x-tarzan-requestheaders'] = $req->request_headers;
00355                         $data = new $this->response_class($headers, $req->getResponseBody(), $req->getResponseCode());
00356 
00357                         // Did Amazon tell us to redirect? Typically happens for multiple rapid requests EU datacenters.
00358                         // @see http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AmazonS3/2006-03-01/Redirects.html
00359                         if ((int) $req->getResponseCode() == 307) // Temporary redirect to new endpoint.
00360                         {
00361                                 $redirects++;
00362                                 $data = $this->authenticate($bucket, 
00363                                         $_opt, 
00364                                         $headers['location'], 
00365                                         $redirects);
00366                         }
00367 
00368                         // Return!
00369                         return $data;
00370                 }
00371         }

00406         public function create_bucket($bucket, $locale = null, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00407         {
00408                 // Defaults
00409                 $body = null;
00410                 $contentType = null;
00411 
00412                 if ($locale)
00413                 {
00414                         switch(strtolower($locale))
00415                         {
00416                                 case 'eu':
00417                                         $body = '<CreateBucketConfiguration><LocationConstraint>' . strtoupper($locale) . '</LocationConstraint></CreateBucketConfiguration>';
00418                                         $contentType = 'application/xml';
00419                                         break;
00420                         }
00421                 }
00422 
00423                 // Authenticate to S3
00424                 return $this->authenticate($bucket, array(
00425                         'verb' => HTTP_PUT,
00426                         'method' => 'create_bucket',
00427                         'body' => $body,
00428                         'contentType' => $contentType,
00429                         'returnCurlHandle' => $returnCurlHandle
00430                 ));
00431         }

00520         public function delete_bucket($bucket, $force = false, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00521         {
00522                 // Set default value
00523                 $success = true;
00524 
00525                 if ($force)
00526                 {
00527                         // Delete all of the items from the bucket.
00528                         $success = $this->delete_all_objects($bucket);
00529                 }
00530 
00531                 // As long as we were successful...
00532                 if ($success)
00533                 {
00534                         // Add this to our request
00535                         $opt = array();
00536                         $opt['verb'] = HTTP_DELETE;
00537                         $opt['method'] = 'delete_bucket';
00538                         $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00539 
00540                         // Authenticate to S3
00541                         return $this->authenticate($bucket, $opt);
00542                 }
00543 
00544                 return false;
00545         }

00557         public function copy_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket)
00558         {
00559                 $dest = $this->create_bucket($dest_bucket);
00560 
00561                 if ($dest->isOK())
00562                 {
00563                         $list = $this->get_object_list($source_bucket);
00564                         $handles = array();
00565         
00566                         foreach ($list as $item)
00567                         {
00568                                 $handles[] = $this->copy_object($source_bucket, $item, $dest_bucket, $item, array(
00569                                         'acl' => S3_ACL_PRIVATE, 
00570                                         'returnCurlHandle' => true
00571                                 ));
00572                         }
00573 
00574                         $request = new $this->request_class(null);
00575                         return $request->sendMultiRequest($handles);
00576                 }
00577         }

00589         public function rename_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket)
00590         {
00591                 $responses = array();
00592                 $responses['copy'] = $this->copy_bucket($source_bucket, $dest_bucket);
00593                 $responses['delete'] = $this->delete_bucket($source_bucket, true);
00594 
00595                 return $responses;
00596         }

00622         public function get_bucket_filesize($bucket, $friendly_format = false)
00623         {
00624                 $filesize = 0;
00625                 $list = $this->list_objects($bucket);
00626 
00627                 foreach ($list->body->Contents as $filename)
00628                 {
00629                         $filesize += (int) $filename->Size;
00630                 }
00631 
00632                 if ($friendly_format)
00633                 {
00634                         $filesize = $this->util->size_readable($filesize);
00635                 }
00636 
00637                 return $filesize;
00638         }

00669         public function get_bucket_list($pcre = null)
00670         {
00671                 // Set some default values
00672                 $bucketnames = array();
00673 
00674                 // Get a list of buckets.
00675                 $list = $this->list_buckets();
00676 
00677                 // If we have a PCRE regex, store it.
00678                 if ($pcre)
00679                 {
00680                         // Loop through and find the bucket names.
00681                         foreach ($list->body->Buckets->Bucket as $bucket)
00682                         {
00683                                 $bucket = (string) $bucket->Name;
00684 
00685                                 if (preg_match($pcre, $bucket))
00686                                 {
00687                                         $bucketnames[] = $bucket;
00688                                 }
00689                         }
00690                 }
00691                 else
00692                 {
00693                         // Loop through and find the bucket names.
00694                         foreach ($list->body->Buckets->Bucket as $bucket)
00695                         {
00696                                 $bucketnames[] = (string) $bucket->Name;
00697                         }
00698                 }
00699 
00700                 return (count($bucketnames) > 0) ? $bucketnames : null;
00701         }

00869         {

00871                 $opt = array();
00872                 $opt['verb'] = HTTP_DELETE;
00873                 $opt['method'] = 'delete_object';

00892         public function delete_all_objects($bucket, $pcre = S3_PCRE_ALL)
00893         {
00894                 // Collect all matches
00895                 $list = $this->get_object_list($bucket, array('pcre', $pcre));
00896 
00897                 // As long as we have at least one match...
00898                 if (count($list) > 0)
00899                 {
00900                         // Hold CURL handles
00901                         $handles = array();
00902 
00903                         // Go through all of the items and delete them.
00904                         foreach ($list as $item)
00905                         {
00906                                 $handles[] = $this->delete_object($bucket, $item, true);
00907                         }
00908 
00909                         $request = new $this->request_class(null);
00910                         return $request->sendMultiRequest($handles);
00911                 }
00912 
00913                 return false;
00914         }

00956         public function get_object_filesize($bucket, $filename, $friendly_format = false)
00957         {
00958                 $object = $this->head_object($bucket, $filename);
00959                 $filesize = (integer) $object->header['content-length'];
00960 
00961                 if ($friendly_format)
00962                 {
00963                         $filesize = $this->util->size_readable($filesize);
00964                 }
00965 
00966                 return $filesize;

00987         public function get_object_list($bucket, $opt = null)
00988         {
00989                 // Set some default values
00990                 $filenames = array();
00991                 $pcre = null;
00992 
00993                 // Get a list of files.
00994                 $list = $this->list_objects($bucket, $opt);
00995 
00996                 // Extract the options
00997                 if ($opt)
00998                 {
00999                         extract($opt);
01000                 }
01001 
01002                 // If we have a PCRE regex, store it.
01003                 if ($pcre)
01004                 {
01005                         // Loop through and find the filenames.
01006                         foreach ($list->body->Contents as $file)
01007                         {
01008                                 $file = (string) $file->Key;
01009 
01010                                 if (preg_match($pcre, $file))
01011                                 {
01012                                         $filenames[] = $file;
01013                                 }
01014                         }
01015                 }
01016                 else
01017                 {
01018                         // Loop through and find the filenames.
01019                         foreach ($list->body->Contents as $file)
01020                         {
01021                                 $filenames[] = (string) $file->Key;
01022                         }
01023                 }
01024 
01025                 return (count($filenames) > 0) ? $filenames : null;
01026         }

01048         public function copy_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $opt = null)
01049         {
01050                 // Add this to our request
01051                 $opt['verb'] = HTTP_PUT;
01052                 $opt['method'] = 'copy_object';
01053                 $opt['sourceBucket'] = $source_bucket;
01054                 $opt['sourceObject'] = $source_filename;
01055                 $opt['destinationBucket'] = $dest_bucket;
01056                 $opt['destinationObject'] = $dest_filename;
01057                 $opt['filename'] = rawurlencode($dest_filename);
01058                 $opt['metadataDirective'] = 'COPY';
01059 
01060                 // Do we have metadata?
01061                 if (isset($opt['meta']) && is_array($opt['meta']))
01062                 {
01063                         $opt['metadataDirective'] = 'REPLACE';
01064                 }
01065 
01066                 // Authenticate to S3
01067                 return $this->authenticate($dest_bucket, $opt);
01068         }

01081         public function duplicate_object($bucket, $source_filename, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE)
01082         {
01083                 return $this->copy_object($bucket, $source_filename, $bucket, $dest_filename, array('acl' => $acl));
01084         }
01085 
01098         public function move_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE)
01099         {
01100                 $copy = $this->copy_object($source_bucket, $source_filename, $dest_bucket, $dest_filename, array('acl' => $acl));
01101                 $del = $this->delete_object($source_bucket, $source_filename);
01102                 return $copy;
01103         }

01133         public function get_object_acl($bucket, $filename, $returnCurlHandle = null)
01134         {
01135                 // Add this to our request
01136                 $opt['verb'] = HTTP_GET;
01137                 $opt['method'] = 'get_object_acl';
01138                 $opt['filename'] = $filename;
01139                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
01140 
01141                 // Authenticate to S3
01142                 return $this->authenticate($bucket, $opt);
01143         }

01157         public function set_object_acl($bucket, $filename, $acl = S3_ACL_PRIVATE, $returnCurlHandle = null)
01158         {
01159                 // Add this to our request
01160                 $opt['verb'] = HTTP_PUT;
01161                 $opt['method'] = 'set_object_acl';
01162                 $opt['filename'] = $filename;
01163                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
01164                 $opt['acl'] = $acl;
01165 
01166                 // Authenticate to S3
01167                 return $this->authenticate($bucket, $opt);
01168         }

01220         // MISCELLANEOUS METHODS
01221 
01238         public function store_remote_file($remote_file, $bucket, $filename, $opt = null)
01239         {
01240                 // Set default values.
01241                 $acl = S3_ACL_PUBLIC;
01242                 $overwrite = false;
01243                 $cname = null;
01244 
01245                 if ($opt)
01246                 {
01247                         // Break the options out.
01248                         extract($opt);
01249                 }
01250 
01251                 // Does the file already exist?
01252                 $object = $this->head_object($bucket, $filename);
01253 
01254                 // As long as it doesn't already exist, fetch and store it.
01255                 if (!$object->isOK() || $overwrite)
01256                 {
01257                         // Fetch the file
01258                         $file = new $this->request_class($remote_file);
01259                         $file->sendRequest();
01260 
01261                         // Store it in S3
01262                         unset($object);
01263                         $object = $this->create_object($bucket, array(
01264                                 'filename' => $filename,
01265                                 'body' => $file->getResponseBody(),
01266                                 'contentType' => $file->getResponseHeader('content-type'),
01267                                 'acl' => $acl
01268                         ));
01269                 }
01270 
01271                 // Was the request successful?
01272                 if ($object->isOK())
01273                 {
01274                         $url = $object->header['x-tarzan-requesturl'];
01275 
01276                         // If we have a virtual host value, use that instead of Amazon's hostname. There are better ways of doing this, but it works for now.
01277                         if ($this->vhost)
01278                         {
01279                                 $url = str_ireplace('http://', '', $url);
01280                                 $url = explode('/', $url);
01281                                 $url[0] = $this->vhost;
01282                                 $url = 'http://' . implode('/', $url);
01283                         }
01284 
01285                         return $url;
01286                 }
01287                 else
01288                 {
01289                         return null;
01290                 }
01291         }
01292 
01304         public function get_object_url($bucket, $filename, $qsa = 0)
01305         {
01306                 if ($qsa)
01307                 {
01308                         // Add this to our request
01309                         $opt['verb'] = HTTP_GET;
01310                         $opt['method'] = 'get_object_url';
01311                         $opt['filename'] = $filename;
01312                         $opt['qsa'] = $qsa;
01313 
01314                         // Adjust the clock
01315                         $old_offset = $this->adjust_offset;
01316                         $this->adjust_offset($qsa);
01317 
01318                         // Authenticate to S3
01319                         $data = $this->authenticate($bucket, $opt);
01320 
01321                         // Reset the clock
01322                         $this->adjust_offset = $old_offset;
01323 
01324                         if ($this->vhost)
01325                         {
01326                                 return 'http://' . $this->vhost . $data['filename'] . '?AWSAccessKeyId=' . $data['key'] . '&Expires=' . $data['expires'] . '&Signature=' . rawurlencode($data['signature']);
01327                         }
01328                         
01329                         return 'http://' . $data['bucket'] . '.s3.amazonaws.com' . $data['filename'] . '?AWSAccessKeyId=' . $data['key'] . '&Expires=' . $data['expires'] . '&Signature=' . rawurlencode($data['signature']);
01330                 }
01331                 else
01332                 {
01333                         // If we're using a virtual host, use that instead.
01334                         if ($this->vhost)
01335                         {
01336                                 return 'http://' . $this->vhost . '/' . $filename;
01337                         }
01338 
01339                         return 'http://' . $bucket . '.s3.amazonaws.com/' . $filename;
01340                 }
01341         }
01342 
01354         public function get_torrent_url($bucket, $filename)
01355         {
01356                 // If we're using a virtual host, use that instead.
01357                 if ($this->vhost)
01358                 {
01359                         return 'http://' . $this->vhost . '/' . $filename . '?torrent';
01360                 }
01361                 return 'http://' . $bucket . '.s3.amazonaws.com/' . $filename . '?torrent';
01362         }
